// Simple HTML & Javascript concept
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<body>
<h1>
<img src = "data:image/jpeg;base64,"/>
</h1>
<p>This is a simple game made by Parker Henderson.</p>

<p>Click on the circle to start.</p>

<script>
var myClicks = 0;
window.onclick = myFunction;

function myFunction() {
   myClicks = myClicks + 1;
   var element = document.getElementById("header");
element.innerHTML = myClicks;

}
</script>
<h2 id="header">Old Header</h2>
</body>
</html>
